Headline: Loop-bound Orange Line Service Delayed
ShortDescription: Loop-bound Orange Line trains will be rerouted to the outer Loop. Crews working to restore service.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Loop-bound Orange Line trains will be rerouted to the outer Loop (trains will board and exit on the Brown Line platforms at Washington/Wells, Quincy/Wells, LaSalle/Van Buren, Adams/Wabash, Washington/Wabash, State/Lake and Clark/Lake).

Personnel are working to restore service. Allow extra travel time.
